projects.title: A peek at some of my
projects.nameProject7: Lihan Biton - RE/MAX Real Estate Agent
projects.description8: A landing page for women-only massage therapy services. Clean user interface, inviting design, and user-friendly approach. The site was built with privacy considerations and clear information presentation. Developed using React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS.
projects.description7: Website for a professional real estate agent at RE/MAX unique. Modern design and user-friendly interface showcasing Lihan Biton's services in Modi'in. Built with React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS.
projects.description1: Discover a modern fitness platform designed to motivate and guide you through your fitness journey. Built using React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.
projects.description2: Experience the beauty of nature through a captivating web platform showcasing stunning locations around the world. Built using React and TailwindCSS
projects.description3: The website showcases a stunning 3D experience with interactive and dynamic design. This project reflects creativity and the use of advanced technologies like React and TailwindCSS, emphasizing modern design and immersive visuals
projects.description4: A website showcasing an interactive 3D design experience with dynamic elements and innovative animations. Built using advanced technologies like React and Three.js.
projects.description5: A responsive Apple website clone showcasing a clean design, animations, and Tailwind CSS integration
projects.description6: An interactive 3D t-shirt customization app built with React and Three.js, allowing users to design shirts in real-time with ease.
projects.femaleVerification1: Are you a woman? This site is intended for women only.
projects.femaleVerification2: Do you confirm that you are a woman and want to view a site dedicated to massage services for women only?

experience.title: Full Stack Development Projects
experience.description: Developed projects with modern web technologies, focusing on interactive, responsive, and scalable MERN applications
experience.description1: Developed cross-platform apps with React Native, emphasizing intuitive interfaces, API integration, and state management
experience.description2: Specialized in developing advanced user experiences using React and Next.js. Implemented responsive designs and performance optimizations. Created dynamic and interactive web interfaces with modern UI/UX principles
experience.description3: Developed servers and managed databases, creating secure APIs with Node.js and Express, using SQL and MongoDB

approach.Phase1text: We'll work together to define your website's objectives, target audience, and main features. We'll review the site structure, navigation, and content requirements to meet your needs
approach.Phase2text: After finalizing the plan, I get started on the coding process. From initial drafts to refined code, I'll keep you informed at each stage of progress
approach.Phase3text: This is where everything comes to life! Using the approved design, I'll develop your website from scratch, turning ideas into a fully functional site
